content.text: Not much, just relaxing and catching up on some tv. What about you?
I'm just finishing up a garden. I love working on it, and it's a great way to get some exercise.
That's awesome! I love gardening too, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like.
Why not? Do you not have a lot of space?
I actually live in the suburbs, so I have plenty of space. I just don't have a lot of time to do it.
That's too bad. Gardening is so therapeutic.
I know, right? I always feel better after I've spent some time in the garden.
Have you ever had food poisoning?
Yes, once! I was so sick. I couldn't eat anything for days.
Me too! I got it from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
Oh no! That's so gross. I'm glad you're okay.
Well, it was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good night!
